byline.original: By EMILY STEEL and MICHAEL CIEPLY

abstract: Lawyers for Manuela Herzer argue that Judge David J Cowan should not dismiss her case challenging mental competency of her former lover Sumner M Redstone until all evidence in case is presented; Cowan had indicated he might dismiss case after hearing Redstone's videotaped testimony.
lead_paragraph: The legal team for the media mogul’s ex-lover argued that his testimony should not be accepted at face value, while his lawyers contended that the case need not proceed.

headline.main: Lawyers in Sumner Redstone Trial Tussle Over Possible Dismissal
headline.print_headline: Lawyers Tussle Over Redstone Trial’s Validity

snippet: The legal team for the media mogul’s ex-lover argued that his testimony should not be accepted at face value, while his lawyers contended that the case need not proceed.

keywords.value: Living Wills and Health Care Proxies
keywords.name: subject
